      • getEncodersForType

        public static MediaCodecInfo[] getEncodersForType(String mimeType)
        Interrogate the device for a list of encoders for the specified media type
        Parameters:
        mimeType - The mime-type of the desired media type (e.g. "video/avc")
        Returns:
        MediaCodecInfo[] An array of Android MediaCodecInfo objects corresponding to installed encoders for the specified media type

      • getProfiles
